snippet.title: NEDRA | First Look | indie.io
snippet.description:
Wishlist NEDRA now on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3357380/NEDRA/ 

NEDRA is a story-driven, atmospheric action-adventure that blends survival horror with cosmic terror. Set in a Soviet-era Antarctic station, where all the explorers have vanished without a trace, leaving players to uncover the chilling truth.
